summary:
Discworld is a popular fantasy book series by Terry Pratchett. It starts in 1983 with *The Colour of Magic* and ends with *The Shepherd's Crown* (2015). The story takes place on a flat planet called Discworld, held up by four elephants on a giant turtle. The books are funny and often make fun of classic stories, mythology, and fairy tales. They also talk about real-world issues in a humorous way.

There are 41 novels, with many adapted into other media. The series was very successful, with over 80 million books sold worldwide.
title: Discworld
